programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc:
En-route for the Gras de Douarnenez
With five days of festivities the Gras de Douarnenez is a carnival on a grand scale! One of the last in Brittany or even in France, this fabulous celebration, open to everyone and every age, sees the entire town dress up and enjoy a chance to laugh at absolutely anything. Report by: Nina Montagné.
Presented by: Marine Barnérias.

programme.title: 5 chefs dans ma cuisine
programme.sub-title: Côtes levées et gratin sans fromage
programme.desc: Pork ribs and a no-cheese gratin Mathieu Cloutier reveals all the secrets of his dry marinade, perfect for making the very best spare ribs you'll find anywhere in the country, served with a parsnip and "ratte" potato gratin made without cheese. Presented by: Marina Orsini. Directed by: Nicole Dussault, David Gauthier, Stéphane Rocheleau, Léo Boulanger (Canada, 2020)

programme.title: De par chez nous
programme.desc: The great outdoors Lisa Savoie-Ferron of Acadie Surf in Lamèque, New Brunswick, and Tony Charest of Zone Aventures in St-Joseph-de-Kamouraska, Quebec, pass on their passion for non-polluting watersports to local residents and visiting tourists alike. Presented by: Marième Ndiaye. Directed by: Julie Lambert, Catherine Leblanc (season 3, Canada, 2018)

programme.title: L'Algérie de Kamel Daoud
programme.desc:
The Mediterranean, the place of women, religion, radiant Oran, powerful Algiers, rebel Kabyle, an independence confiscated, the joy and creativity of the young... Kamel Daoud, francophone writer from Oran whose language is clear and words forceful, invites us for a romantic journey through his personal Algeria.

Directed by: Jean-Marc Giri (France, 2018)

programme.title: Les petites bulles
programme.desc: Giving a voice to the wash house Martine has a passion for sound and takes us to discover the wash houses. An opportunity to create liquid concert!

programme.title: Les contes de Lupin
programme.sub-title: La couronne et le roi singe

programme.title: Massi en mission
programme.sub-title: Les objets qui sont allés dans l'espace
programme.desc: The astronaut David Saint-Jacques challenges the YouTuber Massi Mahiou to prepare for a future space mission. But how exactly do astronauts train? What sort of experiments do they carry out? How do they live with zero gravity? Massi discovers all he needs to know about the mission and about space.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : c'est dans la boîte !
programme.desc:
Rocky's garden
Today, Lily is going to introduce Rocky to the joys of gardening.
Directed by: Angelo Abou Hatem (season 2, Belgium, 2021) With Aurélie Martinez and Romain Angeveld

programme.title: La femme de Jean
programme.desc:
Nadine's existence is shattered when her husband leaves her after living together for fifteen years. Helped by her 17 year-old son Rémi, protective, almost fatherly, she begins to work. She also meets an engineer who encourages her to take up her studies again. Nadine is ready to be reborn...

Directed by: Yannick Bellon (France, 1974) 

Cast: France Lambiotte, Claude Rich, Hippolyte

Genre: Dramedy

programme.title: Faits divers
programme.sub-title: Le jour avant le grand coup
programme.desc:
Episode 5: The day before

The DNA found doesn't match Laveau's. Could it be Kevin's? Océanne, who acted as bait for the sextortionists, reveals that Kevin was one of her victims. Feeling his career is under threat, Claude Voyer gives Frédérik his version of the facts. Meanwhile, Yvan-Gilles recounts Sylvain's. Who's telling the truth?

Directed by: Stéphane Lapointe (season 3, Canada, 2019)

Screenplay: Joanne Arseneau

Cast: Isabelle Blais (Constance Forest), Fred-Éric Salvail (Antoine Chevrier-Marseau), Émile Proulx-Cloutier (Frédérik Bérubé), Maxime Mailloux (Jonas), Patrick Hivon (Sylvain Lauzon), Stéphane Demers (Marc Laveau), Éric Robidoux (Kevin Fontaine), Steve Laplante (Denis Fontaine), Brigitte Lafleur (Kathleen Charron), Daniel Brière (Claude Voyer), Alexa-Jeanne Dubé (Zoé Forest), Guy Nadon (Serge Forest)

Genre: thriller

Parental guidance: not recommended for children under the age of 10 (-10)

programme.title: Faits divers
programme.sub-title: Le jour avant l'arrivée des extraterrestres
programme.desc:
Episode 6: The day before the aliens arrive

To try to clear himself, Kevin feigns his own kidnapping. But all the clues still point inexorably to him. Will he get off the hook? The police discover the bodies of the shooting victims. Frédérik knows his boss is involved. Will he denounce him? Will Kathleen accept her husband's death?

Directed by: Stéphane Lapointe (season 3, Canada, 2019)

Screenplay: Joanne Arseneau

Cast: Isabelle Blais (Constance Forest), Fred-Éric Salvail (Antoine Chevrier-Marseau), Émile Proulx-Cloutier (Frédérik Bérubé), Maxime Mailloux (Jonas), Patrick Hivon (Sylvain Lauzon), Stéphane Demers (Marc Laveau), Éric Robidoux (Kevin Fontaine), Steve Laplante (Denis Fontaine), Brigitte Lafleur (Kathleen Charron), Daniel Brière (Claude Voyer), Alexa-Jeanne Dubé (Zoé Forest), Guy Nadon (Serge Forest)

Genre: thriller

Parental guidance: not recommended for children under the age of 10 (-10)

programme.title: Les maîtres de la peinture moderne
programme.desc: Maurice de Vlaminck Maurice de Vlaminck, né en 1876, passe de l'impressionnisme au fauvisme et au cubisme. Son credo : « Si tu es peintre, ne regarde que dans toi-même ». Sa personnalité rebelle se traduit par une robustesse fougueuse, dans une peinture à la pâte grasse, généreuse, aux touches larges et sûres. Réalisation : Jacques Vichet (France, 2019)

programme.title: OPJ Pacifique Sud
programme.desc: Episode 11: Deathly shallows (1) The body of Jonas Lenoir is fished up near the port of Nouméa, killed by a bullet to the head. The militant ecologist worked to protect the oceans. The brigade is stupefied when the ballistic analysis reveals that it was a bullet from Jackson's gun that killed Lenoir... Directed by: Matthieu Vollaire (season 1, France, 2019) Cast: Yaëlle Trulès (Clarissa Hoarau), Antoine Stip (Gaspard Watson), Nathan Dellemme (Jackson Bellerose), Marielle Karabeu (Kelly Kwaté), Hindra Armede (Agathe Hoarau), Clémentine Julienne (Joséphine Fleury), Julia Paul (Manon Lambert), Alexandre Varga (Raphaël Mayer) Genre: detective

programme.title: OPJ Pacifique Sud
programme.desc: Episode 12: Deathly shallows (2) Why had Jonas Lenoir been killed? It's hard to believe that he had been murdered solely because he was an ecologist and preoccupied with protecting turtles. The investigators rapidly realise that Nouméa's port is not a safe place to venture... Directed by: Matthieu Vollaire (season 1, France, 2019) Cast: Yaëlle Trulès (Clarissa Hoarau), Antoine Stip (Gaspard Watson), Nathan Dellemme (Jackson Bellerose), Marielle Karabeu (Kelly Kwaté), Hindra Armede (Agathe Hoarau), Clémentine Julienne (Joséphine Fleury), Julia Paul (Manon Lambert), Alexandre Varga (Raphaël Mayer) Genre: detective

programme.title: Les maîtres de la peinture moderne
programme.desc: Maurice Utrillo Fils de l'artiste peintre Suzanne Valadon, Maurice Utrillo commence à travailler régulièrement à partir de 1910 et produit des centaines de toiles en plusieurs décennies. Emblématique de l'École de Paris, cette personnalité très tourmentée représente essentiellement des paysages dans lesquels apparaissent souvent des maisons, des coins de villages. Réalisation : Jacques Vichet (France, 2019)

programme.title: Sur les pas de Christian Louboutin
programme.desc:
In two decades, he has taken his vertiginous heels and red soles to the summit of fashion. Olivier Garouste spent several months following Christian Louboutin's everyday life. Between his travels, drawings, workshops and boutiques, the designer invites into his very special world.

Directed by: Olivier Garouste (France, 2020)

programme.title: Un si grand soleil
programme.desc: Épisode 319 Blessé par ses parents, Enzo s'impatiente de ne pas parvenir à mettre le doigt sur la vérité. Alice, en quête de sens, démarre une vie parallèle. Réalisation : Pascal Roy, Émilie Barbault, Sarah Barbault, Virginie Verrier (saison 2, France, 2019) Distribution : Lou Bonetti (Adèle), Aurore Delplace (Johanna), Fred Bianconi (Virgile), Moïse Santamaria (Manu), Mélanie Maudran (Claire), Bertrand Farge (Victor), Fabrice Deville (Florent), Stéphane Monpetit (Eliott), Maëlle Mietton (Alice), Julie Boulanger (Elsa), Marthe Fieschi (Léa), Teilo Azaïs (Enzo) Genre : comédie dramatique

programme.title: TV5MONDE, le journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.
